name: Adaptability
description: This Pokemon's same-type attack bonus (STAB) is 2 instead of 1.5.
battle: The pokemon's energies allow the pokemon to grow slightly stronger, allowing them to hit harder. The boost may not be as strong as how it is in main games, but it's decent enough for changing the odds in a battle. Example: An eevee using Swift, it's assumed to be more likely to hit through blocking obstacles, less likely to get thrown away but also bit more hamrful than the usual.
outside: It allows the pokemon to use its typings in clever ways, trying to adapt to the situations for problem solving, for example, If this ability is being worn by a fire type, it'd be assumed that its likely to use fire without a move, in order to adapt to the circumstances and do something in specific.
random_fact: Moves casted by this ability tend to look slightly more brilliant than the usual due to them being an overload of typing energy.

name: Aerilate
description: This Pokemon's Normal-type moves become Flying type and have 1.2x power.
battle: As expected, this ability turns Normal type moves in Flying type, they are stronger that's for sure, but due to the flying waves it keeps sending, they are unable to hit ground types with it.
outside: This pokemon is quite able to use its ability to generate wind for its daily activities, such as being able to carry a light object with it, or even blew off someone's card castle.

name: Aftermath
description: If this Pokemon is KOed with a contact move, that move's user loses 1/4 its max HP.
battle: In battle, as expected, this ability causes collateral damage to the one that defeated him, this only happens if the pokemon was quite close to the individual during it. And this damage may spread to allies if they are in range.
outside: Outside of battle, this ability doesn't really have much use, but it's known by many that they are able to resist diseases given to their property of harming entities that kill its cells (In summary, its hp reduction applies in a cell level as well)
random_fact: This ability is often skill swapped in hospitals to help fight diseases.

name: Air Lock
description: While this Pokemon is active, the effects of weather conditions are disabled.
battle: When a battle occurs, the weather can't be used against the pokemon and its allies, it simply right away can't be used, its energies oppose with the move or abilities that cast those.
outside: As expected, this ability can always be disabled by the pokemon voluntarily.
random_fact: Air lock is quite popular among the people in Estelia, given the fact it was the name of a popular Album during the 80s.

name: Analytic
description: This Pokemon's attacks have 1.3x power if it is the last to move in a turn.
battle: This ability only benefits if the pokemon doesn't dodge nor evade in the turn, as stated it has to be the last to move in a turn, which means that after taking a hit, it analyzes its advantage with the pokemon and attacks such weak spot during the turn, which allows the character to hit harder.
outside: The perception is very high, being more likely to detect details in the overworld and allows to have a high precision in writing.
random_fact: Having this ability is usually a safe way to get hired for any judge-related job.

name: Anger Point
description: If this Pokemon (not its substitute) takes a critical hit, its Attack is raised to 10+ stages.
battle: When someone hits the Pokemon by taking advantage of its weak spots, it gets upset, adrenaline makes the pokemon get angered which causes it to attack twice as strong.
outside: This ability doesn't necessarily trigger by being hit with a critical hit, sometimes it can trigger if the character is feeling way angry and frustrated, making it be twice as strong, allowing them to break a rock or something.
random_fact: Anger isn't healthy, if used frequently the character may have to go to the hospital.

name: Anticipation
description: On switch-in, this Pokemon shudders if any foe has a supereffective or OHKO move.
battle: When a battle starts, the pokemon is able to tell when a move its harmful for them, this is very useful before starting the battle, because that way your character can know if it's worth battling or escaping.
outside: This anticipation also works like a sense of doing the right thing to do for them, plus it really helps them to notice whoever is looking at them or listening their conversation.
random_fact: Guaranteed job as guard or police, being able to spot things wrong is a very useful skill in jobs, even more in political related ones.

name: Arena Trap
description: Prevents adjacent foes from choosing to switch unless they are airborne.
battle: A circle with 30ft of diameter around the pokemon cause anyone that go near to struggle for escaping, it will most likely have a hard time to escape or approach if they just wanna mindlessly attack
outside: Well, the pokemon is pretty much able to control the area on the ground as long as there's sand. It can use it to even make temporary forts, or even making a hammer out of sand to hit someone that is way way too close.

name: Aroma Veil
description: Protects user/allies from Attract, Disable, Encore, Heal Block, Taunt, and Torment.
battle: A support role takes place in battle, any abilities or special abilities that work in a similar way to the moves stated above, will simply not work as the pokemon is determined.
outside: The pokemon can use this ability to help others feel better and even prevent disturbs
random_fact: Most Police teams tend to have at least one of them to prevent effects on them.

name: Aura Break
description: While this Pokemon is active, the Dark Aura and Fairy Aura power modifier is 0.75x.
battle: This ability tends to decrease the harm of aura oriented energies, it affects the moves as stated.
outside: It's known that this affects Lucarios and Riolus, making them unable to read energies or have aura usage.
random_fact: It's not noticieable for the pokemon when this ability is used, which can give the impression of something going wrong.

name: Bad Dreams
description: Causes sleeping adjacent foes to lose 1/8 of their max HP at the end of each turn.

name: Ball Fetch
description: The pokemon can return a thrown pokeball if it failed.
battle: This ability in battle works as Counter to moves that are affected by Bulletproof, the pokemon after getting hit by the damaging attack, it can keep holding the move's energy in its mouth and then throw it back. Not guaranteed to hit.
outside: The pokemon is more eager to use its mouth to hold things firmly, even if it's a cold or hot item.
random_fact: Yes-- People with the ability are known for being great at ball related sports.

name: Battery
description: This Pokemon's allies have the power of their special attacks multiplied by 1.3.
battle: As stated, it is a living battery, its energy is used to fill the typing of people, which increases their attack
outside: Increasing people's typing energy can help for non battling purposes as well.
random_fact: It's known for also helping with Magic, like any energy typing increase.

name: Battle Armor
description: This Pokemon cannot be struck by a critical hit.
battle: There's literally no way to find weak spots in this pokemon, if you're gonna try to hit them point blank, they'll always be able to try to reduce the impact or protect themselves in a way it makes less damage.
outside: This boosts their perception, so when they are gonna get hit by something as result of their clumsyness, the ability triggers and moves their body in such the damage is decreased.
random_fact: Not much to add here other than the cliche of people referring to it as plot armor

name: Battle Bond
description: When the Pok√©mon knocks out a target, its bond with its Trainer is strengthened, and its Attack, Sp. Atk, and Speed stats are boosted.

name: Beast Boost
description: This Pokemon's highest stat is raised by 1 if it attacks and KOes another Pokemon.
battle: As soon as they defeat someone, a monster or a npc, they get stronger.
outside: It allows to safely breathe in the ultra worm holes and be able to move within them.
random_fact: All UltraBeast have this ability and only have this one.

name: Berserk
description: This Pokemon's Sp. Atk is raised by 1 when it reaches 1/2 or less of its max HP.
battle: When the pokemon have received hits for a while, its heart proceeds to accelerate, giving an increse of a 25%.
outside: It can also trigger when frustrated or angry
random_fact: Repeated use of this ability may require a visit to the hospital.

name: Big Pecks
description: Prevents other Pokemon from lowering this Pokemon's Defense stat stage.
battle: They rely on their own body rather than the typing energy, which makes defense drops useless.
outside: Strength, not much else to say.
random_fact: It's a good ability to have in physicial oriented jobs

name: Blaze
description: At 1/3 or less of its max HP, this Pokemon's attacking stat is 1.5x with Fire attacks.
battle: Heart is beating, tries to accelerate given the circumstances and the Fire is increased
outside: When feeling depressed or sad, fire may lower, and if feeling too angry, it can be activated
random_fact: Activating it often, may require a visit to the hospital

name: Bulletproof
description: Makes user immune to ballistic moves (Shadow Ball, Sludge Bomb, Focus Blast, etc).
battle: The skin of the character protects the pokemon very well, making them not get hurt and continue using that turn in advantage
outside: It can protect with thrown projectiles.
random_fact: Police tends to have at least one of them in their teams.

name: Cheek Pouch
description: If this Pokemon eats a Berry, it restores 1/3 of its max HP after the Berry's effect.
battle: Berries will always heal the pokemon, regardless of the Berry's effect, however it takes them a while to eat due to the way they eat (wait 1 turn)
outside: It allows the pokemon to easily store berries in its cheeks
random_fact: Not much to add here aside of having big cheeks.

name: Chilling Neigh
description: This Pokemon's Attack is raised by 1 stage if it attacks and KOes another Pokemon.
battle: As soon as they defeat someone, a monster or a npc, they get stronger.
outside: Getting angry or too emotive can trigger the ability

name: Chlorophyll
description: If Sunny Day is active, this Pokemon's Speed is doubled.
battle: This speed allows the pokemon to be able to react to the things that are being used against them more easily.
outside: Speed affects travel, and can trigger if there's harsh sunlight.
random_fact: It's way too popular for most NPCs

name: Clear Body
description: Prevents other Pokemon from lowering this Pokemon's stat stages.
battle: The pokemon's body works fully by itself, being unreliant in Type energies, making decreases impossible to happen

name: Cloud Nine
description: While this Pokemon is active, the effects of weather conditions are disabled.

name: Color Change
description: This Pokemon's type changes to the type of a move it's hit by, unless it has the type.

name: Comatose
description: This Pokemon cannot be statused, and is considered to be asleep.

name: Competitive
description: This Pokemon's Sp. Atk is raised by 2 for each of its stats that is lowered by a foe.

name: Compound Eyes
description: This Pokemon's moves have their accuracy multiplied by 1.3.

name: Contrary
description: If this Pokemon has a stat stage raised it is lowered instead, and vice versa.

name: Corrosion
description: This Pokemon can poison or badly poison other Pokemon regardless of their typing.

name: Cotton Down
description: If this Pokemon is hit, it lowers the Speed of all other Pokemon on the field 1 stage.

name: Curious Medicine
description: On switch-in, this Pokemon's allies have their stat stages reset to 0.

name: Cursed Body
description: If this Pokemon is hit by an attack, there is a 30% chance that move gets disabled.

name: Cute Charm

name: Dancer

name: Dark Aura
description: While this Pokemon is active, a Dark move used by any Pokemon has 1.33x power.

name: Dauntless Shield

name: Dazzling

name: Defeatist
description: While this Pokemon has 1/2 or less of its max HP, its Attack and Sp. Atk are halved.

name: Defiant

name: Desolate Land

name: Disguise

name: Drizzle

name: Drought

name: Dry Skin

name: Emergency Exit

name: Flash Fire

name: Flower Gift

name: Fluffy
description: This Pokemon takes 1/2 damage from contact moves, 2x damage from Fire moves.

name: Forecast

name: Forewarn
description: On switch-in, this Pokemon is alerted to the foes' move with the highest power.

name: Friend Guard
description: This Pokemon's allies receive 3/4 damage from other Pokemon's attacks.

name: Frisk

name: Full Metal Body
description: Prevents other Pokemon from lowering this Pokemon's stat stages.

description: This Pokemon's Defense is doubled.

name: Gale Wings

name: Galvanize

name: Gluttony
description: When this Pokemon has 1/2 or less of its maximum HP, it uses certain Berries early.

name: Gooey

name: Gorilla Tactics

name: Grassy Surge

name: Gulp Missile

name: Guts
description: If this Pokemon is statused, its Attack is 1.5x; ignores burn halving physical damage.

name: Harvest
description: If last item used is a Berry, 50% chance to restore it each end of turn. 100% in Sun.

name: Healer

name: Heatproof

name: Heavy Metal
description: This Pokemon's weight is doubled.

name: Honey Gather
description: No competitive use.

name: Huge Power
description: This Pokemon's Attack is doubled.

name: Hunger Switch
description: If Morpeko, it changes between Full Belly and Hangry Mode at the end of each turn.

name: Hustle

name: Hydration
description: This Pokemon has its status cured at the end of each turn if Rain Dance is active.

name: Hyper Cutter
description: Prevents other Pokemon from lowering this Pokemon's Attack stat stage.

name: Ice Body

name: Ice Face
description: If Eiscue, the first physical hit it takes deals 0 damage. This effect is restored in Hail.

name: Ice Scales
description: This Pokemon receives 1/2 damage from special attacks.

name: Illuminate
description: No competitive use.

name: Illusion

name: Immunity
description: This Pokemon cannot be poisoned. Gaining this Ability while poisoned cures it.

name: Imposter
description: On switch-in, this Pokemon Transforms into the opposing Pokemon that is facing it.

name: Infiltrator
description: Moves ignore substitutes and foe's Reflect/Light Screen/Safeguard/Mist/Aurora Veil.

name: Innards Out
description: If this Pokemon is KOed with a move, that move's user loses an equal amount of HP.

name: Inner Focus
description: This Pokemon cannot be made to flinch. Immune to Intimidate.

name: Insomnia

name: Intimidate
description: On switch-in, this Pokemon lowers the Attack of adjacent opponents by 1 stage.

name: Intrepid Sword
description: On switch-in, this Pokemon's Attack is raised by 1 stage.

name: Iron Barbs
description: Pokemon making contact with this Pokemon lose 1/8 of their max HP.

name: Iron Fist
description: This Pokemon's punch-based attacks have 1.2x power. Sucker Punch is not boosted.

name: Justified

name: Keen Eye
description: This Pokemon's accuracy can't be lowered by others; ignores their evasiveness stat.

name: Klutz

name: Leaf Guard
description: If Sunny Day is active, this Pokemon cannot be statused and Rest will fail for it.

name: Levitate
description: This Pokemon is immune to Ground; Gravity/Ingrain/Smack Down/Iron Ball nullify it.

name: Libero
description: This Pokemon's type changes to match the type of the move it is about to use.

name: Light Metal
description: This Pokemon's weight is halved.

name: Lightning Rod

name: Limber

name: Liquid Ooze

name: Liquid Voice
description: This Pokemon's sound-based moves become Water type.

name: Long Reach
description: This Pokemon's attacks do not make contact with the target.

name: Magic Bounce
description: This Pokemon blocks certain status moves and bounces them back to the user.

name: Magic Guard
description: This Pokemon can only be damaged by direct attacks.

name: Magician

name: Magma Armor

name: Magnet Pull
description: Prevents adjacent Steel-type foes from choosing to switch.

name: Marvel Scale
description: If this Pokemon is statused, its Defense is 1.5x.

name: Mega Launcher
description: This Pokemon's pulse moves have 1.5x power. Heal Pulse heals 3/4 target's max HP.

name: Merciless

name: Mimicry

name: Minus

name: Mirror Armor

name: Misty Surge
description: On switch-in, this Pokemon summons Misty Terrain.

name: Mold Breaker
description: This Pokemon's moves and their effects ignore the Abilities of other Pokemon.

name: Moody

name: Motor Drive
description: This Pokemon's Speed is raised 1 stage if hit by an Electric move; Electric immunity.

name: Moxie
description: This Pokemon's Attack is raised by 1 stage if it attacks and KOes another Pokemon.

name: Multiscale

name: Multitype

name: Mummy

name: Natural Cure
description: This Pokemon has its non-volatile status condition cured when it switches out.

name: Neuroforce
description: This Pokemon's attacks that are super effective against the target do 1.25x damage.

name: Neutralizing Gas
description: While this Pokemon is active, Abilities have no effect.

name: No Guard

name: Normalize

name: Oblivious

name: Overcoat

name: Overgrow

name: Own Tempo
description: This Pokemon cannot be confused. Immune to Intimidate.

name: Parental Bond

name: Pastel Veil
description: This Pokemon and its allies cannot be poisoned. On switch-in, cures poisoned allies.

name: Perish Body

name: Pixilate
description: This Pokemon's Normal-type moves become Fairy type and have 1.2x power.

description: This Pokemon receives 3/4 damage from supereffective attacks.

description: This Pokemon's Defense is raised by 1 stage after it is damaged by a move.

name: Steelworker

name: Steely Spirit

name: Stench
description: This Pokemon's attacks without a chance to flinch gain a 10% chance to flinch.

name: Sticky Hold
description: This Pokemon cannot lose its held item due to another Pokemon's attack.

name: Storm Drain
description: This Pokemon draws Water moves to itself to raise Sp. Atk by 1; Water immunity.

name: Strong Jaw
description: This Pokemon's bite-based attacks have 1.5x power. Bug Bite is not boosted.

name: Sturdy
description: If this Pokemon is at full HP, it survives one hit with at least 1 HP. Immune to OHKO.

name: Suction Cups
description: This Pokemon cannot be forced to switch out by another Pokemon's attack or item.

name: Super Luck
description: This Pokemon's critical hit ratio is raised by 1 stage.

name: Surge Surfer
description: If Electric Terrain is active, this Pokemon's Speed is doubled.

name: Swarm
description: At 1/3 or less of its max HP, this Pokemon's attacking stat is 1.5x with Bug attacks.

name: Sweet Veil
description: This Pokemon and its allies cannot fall asleep.

name: Swift Swim
description: If Rain Dance is active, this Pokemon's Speed is doubled.

name: Symbiosis
description: If an ally uses its item, this Pokemon gives its item to that ally immediately.

name: Synchronize
description: If another Pokemon burns/poisons/paralyzes this Pokemon, it also gets that status.

name: Tangled Feet
description: This Pokemon's evasiveness is doubled as long as it is confused.

name: Tangling Hair
description: Pokemon making contact with this Pokemon have their Speed lowered by 1 stage.

name: Technician
description: This Pokemon's moves of 60 power or less have 1.5x power. Includes Struggle.

name: Telepathy
description: This Pokemon does not take damage from attacks made by its allies.

name: Teravolt
description: This Pokemon's moves and their effects ignore the Abilities of other Pokemon.

name: Thick Fat
description: Fire/Ice-type moves against this Pokemon deal damage with a halved attacking stat.

name: Tinted Lens
description: This Pokemon's attacks that are not very effective on a target deal double damage.

name: Torrent
description: At 1/3 or less of its max HP, this Pokemon's attacking stat is 1.5x with Water attacks.

name: Tough Claws
description: This Pokemon's contact moves have their power multiplied by 1.3.

name: Toxic Boost
description: While this Pokemon is poisoned, its physical attacks have 1.5x power.

name: Trace
description: On switch-in, or when it can, this Pokemon copies a random adjacent foe's Ability.

name: Transistor
description: This Pokemon's attacking stat is multiplied by 1.5 while using an Electric-type attack.

name: Triage
description: This Pokemon's healing moves have their priority increased by 3.

name: Truant
description: This Pokemon skips every other turn instead of using a move.

name: Turboblaze
description: This Pokemon's moves and their effects ignore the Abilities of other Pokemon.

name: Unaware
description: This Pokemon ignores other Pokemon's stat stages when taking or doing damage.

name: Unburden
description: Speed is doubled on held item loss; boost is lost if it switches, gets new item/Ability.

name: Unnerve
description: While this Pokemon is active, it prevents opposing Pokemon from using their Berries.

name: Unseen Fist
description: All contact moves hit through protection.

name: Victory Star
description: This Pokemon and its allies' moves have their accuracy multiplied by 1.1.

name: Vital Spirit
description: This Pokemon cannot fall asleep. Gaining this Ability while asleep cures it.

name: Volt Absorb
description: This Pokemon heals 1/4 of its max HP when hit by Electric moves; Electric immunity.

name: Wandering Spirit
description: Pokemon making contact with this Pokemon have their Ability swapped with this one.

name: Water Absorb
description: This Pokemon heals 1/4 of its max HP when hit by Water moves; Water immunity.

name: Water Bubble
description: This Pokemon's Water power is 2x; it can't be burned; Fire power against it is halved.

name: Water Compaction
description: This Pokemon's Defense is raised 2 stages after it is damaged by a Water-type move.

name: Water Veil
description: This Pokemon cannot be burned. Gaining this Ability while burned cures it.

name: Weak Armor
description: If a physical attack hits this Pokemon, Defense is lowered by 1, Speed is raised by 2.

name: White Smoke
description: Prevents other Pokemon from lowering this Pokemon's stat stages.

name: Wimp Out
description: This Pokemon switches out when it reaches 1/2 or less of its maximum HP.

name: Wonder Guard
description: This Pokemon can only be damaged by supereffective moves and indirect damage.

name: Wonder Skin
description: Status moves with accuracy checks are 50% accurate when used on this Pokemon.

name: Zen Mode
description: If Darmanitan, at end of turn changes Mode to Standard if > 1/2 max HP, else Zen.

name: Anger Shell
description: When an attack causes its HP to drop to half or less, the Pok√©mon gets angry. This lowers its Defense and Sp. Def stats but boosts its Attack, Sp. Atk, and Speed stats.

name: Armor Tail
description: The mysterious tail covering the Pok√©mon's head makes opponents unable to use priority moves against the Pok√©mon or its allies.

name: Beads of Ruin
description: The power of the Pok√©mon's ruinous beads lowers the Sp. Def stats of all Pok√©mon except itself.

name: Commander
description: Can get protected by an ally Dondozo if one is on the field. The Pok√©mon then issues commands from the protection.

name: Costar
description: When the Pok√©mon enters a battle, it copies an ally's stat changes.

name: Cud Chew
description: When the Pok√©mon eats a Berry, it will regurgitate that Berry at the end of the next turn and eat it one more time.

name: Earth Eater
description: If hit by a Ground-type move, the Pok√©mon has its HP restored instead of taking damage.

name: Electromorphosis
description: The Pok√©mon becomes charged when it takes damage, boosting the power of the next Electric-type move the Pok√©mon uses.

name: Good as Gold
description: A body of pure, solid gold gives the Pok√©mon full immunity to other Pok√©mon's status moves.

name: Guard Dog
description: Boosts the Pok√©mon's Attack stat if intimidated. Moves and items that would force the Pok√©mon to switch out also fail to work.

name: Hadron Engine
description: Turns the ground into Electric Terrain when the Pok√©mon enters a battle. The futuristic engine within the Pok√©mon also boosts its Sp. Atk stat on Electric Terrain.

name: Lingering Aroma
description: Contact with the Pok√©mon changes the attacker's Ability to Lingering Aroma.

name: Mycelium Might
description: The Pok√©mon will always act more slowly when using status moves, but these moves will be unimpeded by the Ability of the target.

name: Opportunist
description: If an opponent's stat is boosted, the Pok√©mon seizes the opportunity to boost the same stat for itself.

name: Orichalcum Pulse
description: Turns the sunlight harsh when the Pok√©mon enters a battle. The ancient pulse thrumming through the Pok√©mon also boosts its Attack stat in harsh sunlight.

name: Protosynthesis
description: Boosts the Pok√©mon's most proficient stat in harsh sunlight or if the Pok√©mon is holding Booster Energy.

name: Purifying Salt
description: The Pok√©mon's pure salt protects it from status conditions and halves the damage taken from Ghost-type moves.

name: Quark Drive
description: Boosts the Pok√©mon's most proficient stat on Electric Terrain or if the Pok√©mon is holding Booster Energy.

name: Rocky Payload
description: Powers up Rock-type moves.

name: Seed Sower
description: Turns the ground into Grassy Terrain when the Pok√©mon is hit by an attack.

name: Sharpness
description: Powers up slicing moves.

name: Supreme Overlord
description: When the Pok√©mon enters a battle, its Attack and Sp. Atk stats are slightly boosted for each of the allies in its party that have already been defeated.

name: Sword of Ruin
description: The power of the Pok√©mon's ruinous sword lowers the Defense stats of all Pok√©mon except itself.

name: Tablets of Ruin
description: The power of the Pok√©mon's ruinous wooden tablets lowers the Attack stats of all Pok√©mon except itself.

name: Thermal Exchange
description: Boosts the Attack stat when the Pok√©mon is hit by a Fire-type move. The Pok√©mon also cannot be burned.

name: Toxic Debris
description: Scatters poison spikes at the feet of the opposing team when the Pok√©mon takes damage from physical moves.

name: Vessel of Ruin
description: The power of the Pok√©mon's ruinous vessel lowers the Sp. Atk stats of all Pok√©mon except itself.

name: Well-Baked Body
description: The Pok√©mon takes no damage when hit by Fire-type moves. Instead, its Defense stat is sharply boosted.

name: Wind Power
description: The Pok√©mon becomes charged when it is hit by a wind move, boosting the power of the next Electric-type move the Pok√©mon uses.

name: Wind Rider
description: Boosts the Pok√©mon's Attack stat if Tailwind takes effect or if the Pok√©mon is hit by a wind move. The Pok√©mon also takes no damage from wind moves.

name: Zero to Hero
description: The Pok√©mon transforms into its Hero Form when it switches out.

name: Supersweet Syrup
description: Lowers the evasion of opposing Pok√©mon by 1 stage when first sent into battle

name: Hospitability
description: Heals up to 25% of its partner Pok√©mon's Maximum Hit Points when it enters battle

name: Toxic Chain
description: The power of the Pok√©mon's toxic chain may badly poison any target the Pok√©mon hits with a move.
